intro: Palicourea valenzuelana, commonly known as the yellow starling plant, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it typically grows in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its opposite, ovate leaves and clusters of small, yellowish-white flowers. Its fruit is a small, round drupe that contains a single seed. Palicourea valenzuelana is sometimes used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
